Text.Page:
The mycanars are guardians not unlike the unseelie were, but they're attacking us now. I hate to order their deaths, but with so many threats in Darkquaver Woods, we must act decisively.

Kill the mycanars and report back to me.
Senseless deaths are always a tragedy, but we must take the long view. If Thulsa keeps us divided and distracted, we stand to lose a great deal more than a few mycanars.
